Name: COMMODITIES
EIF: provisionally on 1 January 1978, in accordance with article 75(2) and definitively on 2 January 1980, in accordance with article 75(1). The Agreement was extended by Decisions Nos. 13 and 14 adopted by the International Coffee Council on 20 November 1981 and 21 May 1982, respectively [see chapter XIX.18 a)].
